summary: March 15 is the 74th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Farzad Bazoft  was an Iranian-born journalist who settled in the United Kingdom in the mid-1970s. He worked as a freelance reporter for The Observer. He was arrested by Iraqi authorities and executed in 1990 after being convicted of spying for Israel while working in Iraq.
title: Farzad Bazoft
